name: marketputer
description: Orchestrator agent that coordinates and pays multiple specialized agents using x402 micropayments

scripts.memeputer: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --budget 1.0 --brand brands/memeputer.json
scripts.memeputer:loop: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --budget 1.0 --brand brands/memeputer.json --loop
scripts.payai: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --budget 1.0 --brand brands/payai.json
scripts.tgmetrics: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --budget 1.0 --brand brands/tgmetrics.json
